Installing and loading R packages: tidyverse and ggiragh

```{r}
pacman::p_load(ggiraph,tidyverse)
```

Importing data

```{r}
exam_data <- read.csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=exam_data,
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
         geom_dotplot(dotsize = 0.5)
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot_interactive(
    aes(tooltip = ID),
    stackgroups = TRUE, 
    binwidth = 1, 
    method = "histodot") +
  scale_y_continuous(NULL, 
                     breaks = NULL)
girafe(
  ggobj = p,
  width_svg = 6,
  height_svg = 6*0.618
)
```
